title: Neenda Naal Lyrics Thiruttuppayale 2
stanzas:
Â neenda naal aanadhu
nenjam oonjal aadudhu
vaan nila vandhathum
megam ellaam mooduthu

anbe nee ariyaamal
en nenjam puriyaamal
konjamaai konjamaai
thirai pottu paarkkuthu

nenjame nenjame
enna naanum sevadhu
aayiram kaigalaal
unnai alla thonudhu

imaiyaaga vizhi moodi
siragaaga thalai kodhi
thaaimaiyin thaliviyai
thaalaatta thonudhu.

neenda naal aanadhu
nenjam oonjal aadudhu

ennamo ennamo
ullam solla yaengudhu
sollavum vendumaa
vaarthai moochu vaanguthu

oru pakkam pani kaatru
maru pakkam anal ootru
idhayame idhayame
idhu enna vizhiyaatu
